body.p: To navigate precisely to a part of the document you are editing in the Text mode, use the Go to dialog. To open the Go to dialog, go to Find Go to ... (Ctrl+L (Cmd+L on Mac)) .

ul.li: Line - destination line in the current document;
Column - destination column in the current document;
Offset - destination offset relative to the beginning of document.
